snippet: The accident occurred on the first lap of the World Superbike race in San Francisco.
abstract: Spanish racers Bernat Martinez and Daniel Rivas die in chain-reaction crash during first lap of World Superbike motorcycle race in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: The accident occurred on the first lap of the World Superbike race in San Francisco.

headline.main: Two Riders From Spain Die in Motorcycle Crash
headline.print_headline: Two Riders From Spain Die in Crash
